name: bianir

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wb(w1, w0)), w1)
-| wi(wb(w1, w0), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wb(w1, w0)), w1)
-| wi(wb(w1, w0), wi(w0, w1))

comment: A closed form of ~ mpbir , analogous to ~ pm2.27 (assertion). (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Roger Witte, 17-Aug-2020.)
